categories: Category:Imperial Navy enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Corporal Grenwick was a male Human Death Star trooper who served as a guard and interrogator aboard first Death Star during the Galactic Civil War.

In 0 BBY, Grenwick acted as Sergeant Major Enfield's tactical advisor and coordinated the service schedule of the detention block. He was an interrogation technician and was present when Darth Vader interrogated and tortured Princess Leia Organa of Alderaan in her cell.
Not too long after, the first Death Star saw its destruction in the Battle of Yavin.
Grenwick was portrayed by Harry Fielder in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
